pages.text: Vendoconularia triradiata comes from the Upper Ediacaran, with fossils found from the White Sea, Russia. They are conularrid-like lifeforms that could grow up to 5.5 cm in height. It is believed that the cone would have housed a tentacled organism, and it is also proposed that Vendoconularia represents the earliest conularrid, but this has been long debated.
